title: Ep 181 | How Phil and Jase Prep for Duck Season and Advice for a Family Who's New to Christianity
description:
Phil and Jase spend all year getting ready for duck season, but when it finally rolls around, Miss Kay and Missy have a name for it: "The Ordeal." Jase highly recommends having the duck-hunting conversation before you get married. The guys also answer audience questions about how a young family can focus on Jesus in the home, how to end a struggle with sin after you repent, and how to share Jesus with a homosexual friend or family member.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
